Does the Audio sound bad because it's in:

canopener, the audio sounds bad because it's not the real bluray audio! it's a fake ac3, that's why it sounds so aweful. and of course he "forgot" to mention it in the torrent description.

I'd guess the audio is off key because Russia's video format is PAL 25fps. And I know when you convert 25fps to NTSC 23.976fps you get audio pitch issues. Such a slight change in pitch that most people won't notice it, but some do. Not quite loyal to the movie's intention, so that's why I hate PAL->NTSC converted video.
